trans-unit.source: Learn how to secure Web, Mobile, API and Logic apps in Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to secure Web, Mobile, API and Logic apps in Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Services complies with the key industry standards for security and reliability to provide our customers a secure platform.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Services complies with the key industry standards for security and reliability to provide our customers a secure platform.

trans-unit.source: We have several easy to use features to help secure both inbound and outbound traffic for your app.
trans-unit.target: We have several easy to use features to help secure both inbound and outbound traffic for your app.

trans-unit.source: We also help customers secure their application code by providing externally provided functionality to scan your web application for vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: We also help customers secure their application code by providing externally provided functionality to scan your web application for vulnerabilities.
